movies.name: Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani
movies.description: Flamboyant Punjabi Rocky and intellectual Bengali journalist Rani fall in love despite their differences. After facing family opposition, they decide to live with each other's families for three months before getting married.

movies.name: Jawan
movies.description: A prison warden recruits inmates to commit outrageous crimes that shed light on corruption and injustice - and that lead him to an unexpected reunion.

movies.name: Pathaan
movies.description: An Indian agent races against a doomsday clock as a ruthless mercenary, with a bitter vendetta, mounts an apocalyptic attack against the country.

movies.name: 12th Fail
movies.description: The real-life story of IPS Officer Manoj Kumar Sharma and IRS Officer Shraddha Joshi.

movies.name: Hanu Man
movies.description: An imaginary place called Anjanadri where the protagonist gets the powers of Hanuman and fights for Anjanadri.

movies.name: Satyaprem Ki Katha
movies.description: A middle-class boy in Ahmedabad, Satyaprem falling in one-sided love with Katha, who is coping with her breakup with Tapan. Through the journey, they discover each other's life and complement in accomplishing what was left halfway.

movies.name: Tiger 3
movies.description: Tiger and Zoya are back - to save the country and their family. This time it's personal.

movies.name: Dunki
movies.description: When his friends in Punjab struggle to clear the immigration process, an ex-soldier guides them on a risky journey to enter the UK without permission.

movies.name: Devara Part 1
movies.description: A mighty sea warrior takes a violent stand against the criminal deeds of his village. Years later, his mild-mannered son walks a path of his own.

movies.name: Bade Miyan Chote Miyan
movies.description: Two elite soldiers with troubled pasts are enlisted for a daring mission when a deadly masked villain threatens India's defenses.

movies.name: Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan
movies.description: The eldest brother refuses to marry since he believes it may create disharmony in his big family. His brothers, who've already found partners, come together to find a match for him.

movies.name: Bholaa
movies.description: After getting out of prison with the desire to meet his daughter, Bholaa's plans are interrupted by a well-orchestrated drug bust.

movies.name: Stree 2: Sarkate Ka Aatank
movies.description: After the events of Stree, the town of Chanderi is being haunted again. This time, women are mysteriously abducted by a terrifying headless entity. Once again, it's up to Vicky and his friends to save their town and loved ones.

movies.name: Murder Mubarak
movies.description: During a murder investigation, a non-traditional police officer turns a spotlight on an array of suspects. He steps into their world as an outsider, only to find there is so much more than what meets the eye.

movies.name: Samrat Prithviraj
movies.description: A magnum opus recounting the glorious tale of one of India's bravest emperors- Samrat Prithviraj Chauhan. Inspired from the epic poem Prithviraj Raaso and other folklores.

movies.name: Bad Newz
movies.description: A crazy laugh riot which will show the outcomes of two sophisticated Punjabi men and a Punjabi girl. One of the men has a one night stand with the girl and somehow, craziness happens when she is pregnant unexpectedly.

movies.name: Singham Again
movies.description: A new chase is coming - with reference to the epic Ramayana, Singham and his team face an ambiguous villain in order to save his wife.

movies.name: Munjya
movies.description: A young man's visit to his native village unveils a family secret and a vengeful spirit, the Munjya, who wants to get married. Now the young man must fight to protect himself and his love from Munjya's clutches.

movies.name: The Greatest of All Time
movies.description: Gandhi is a hostage negotiator, field agent, and spy working for the Special Anti-Terrorist Squad (SATS). After years of service, he is called back for a critical mission that sets him on a dangerous collision course with his own ...

movies.name: Fighter
movies.description: A reckless yet brilliant squadron leader and his team of elite fighter pilots face mortal dangers and inner demons as they unite for a deadly mission.

slider.name: Pushpa 2: The Rule
slider.description: A consignment of red sandalwood arrives at the Yokohama port in Japan, where workers are shocked to find Pushpa hidden inside one of the containers. He attacks them, demanding payment for the load but is shot and falls into the sea, triggering a flashback.

slider.name: Mufasa: The Lion King
slider.description: Mufasa, a cub lost and alone, meets a sympathetic lion named Taka, the heir to a royal bloodline. The chance meeting sets in motion an expansive journey of a group of misfits searching for their destiny.

slider.name: Kalki 2898 AD
slider.description: The future of those in the dystopian city of Kasi is altered when the destined arrival of Lord Vishnu's final avatar launches a war against darkness.

slider.name: Red One
slider.description: After Santa Claus is kidnapped, the North Pole's Head of Security must team up with the world's most infamous bounty hunter in a globe-trotting, action-packed mission to save Christmas.

slider.name: Venom: The Last Dance
slider.description: Eddie Brock and Venom must make a devastating decision as they're pursued by a mysterious military man and alien monsters from Venom's home world.
